title: Sean Everitt
text: Sean Everitt is a South African professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> football coach. He was named as head coach of the <a href="Sharks%20%28rugby%20union%29">Sharks</a> team that plays in the <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> competition. He is also the coach of the <a href="Sharks%20%28Currie%20Cup%29">Sharks (Currie Cup)</a> team that competes in the <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a>.
